content: Hi! How I can change owner organization?
You can edit User roles at <Your org URL>/#organization/user-list-admin
This topic was moved here from #frontend > Change owner organization by Alex Vandiver.

@Alex: If you mean changing the email address of the server's administrator, that is indeed ZULIP_ADMINISTRATOR, which is set in /etc/zulip/settings.py. You'll need to restart Zulip after making any changes to that file, which can be done by running ~/deployments/current/scripts/restart-server as the zulip user.
There was a problem with changing the message retention policy
You'll need to be more specific about the problem you ran into -- and I don't understand how that's related to changing the ZULIP_ADMINISTRATOR setting.
